attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I was digusted to hear that some schools are deciding not to teach pupils about the holocaust of fear off upsetting other cultures this is out rages...It is our history.. also to do this is a knife  in the back for all that died in it...I am disgusted…so I start this petition to ask people to sign it so we can get the government to stop this at once and make schools continue to teach about the holocaust and the rest of our British history

rejection.details: Your title should be a call for action, not a statement / name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
